# external/ â€” Third-party or Uncontrolled Data

## Purpose

This directory stores data obtained from **third-party sources** that is:

- Not part of the core raw dataset  
- Supplementary or enrichment data  
- Static reference data (lookup tables, metadata, taxonomies)  

This data is typically not modified, except for format conversions.
